headline: JPMorgan Links Child Retirement Push With Jamie Dimon Option Incentives
summary: JPMorgan Chase (NYSE:JPM) has joined other major US banks in a new initiative to match government contributions to children's retirement accounts. The program is aimed at encouraging long term retirement saving habits from an early age. CEO Jamie Dimon is set to receive a substantial stock option grant that ties a portion of his compensation to the bank's future share performance. For you as an investor, this puts a fresh spotlight on how a large universal bank such as JPMorgan Chase,...
